channel.title: Armo Scape Client -First Release-
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][/font]Hey Guys This Is My First Release For My Client.
[s][/s]DeltaScape Base
Uppit Download Link: http://uppit.com/KF65ER
Features: [i][/i]100% Rs Spec's [i][/i]100% Quest's [i][/i]100% Jad Wave's,Pest Control,Drag Lair,Fight Pit's & Much More! [i][/i]100% Range/Mage Skills,Prayer Etc.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/aaxe6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2jg2j3d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/10hlvt5.jpg[/img]
You Will Need Winrar Installed So You Can Run The Client, If You Don't Got Goto: Google>Winrar Download, And You Will Probably Find A Download Link.
[color=purple][/color]Thanks For All The People Helped Me Make The Client, And I Will Make More Updates On The Server Next Release. -Thank You,Sorry For My Bad Pic Taking :P
Uppit Link: http://uppit.com/KF65ER

item.title: Armo Scape Client -First Release-
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“Chris GD, post:15, topic:233713”]It don’t show much you should crop your pictures next time.

Goodluck if your trying update it.[/quote]No use to give out ideas to a member that hasn’t been active for a while, also, why would he want to update it - This is atleast 1 year old and he has given up on it most likely, as all those other morons who can think they can make stuff that will become useful gave up on there projects too.
-Don’t grave dig next time, Dragonchain. If you would like to ask a member a question in a topic alteast 1 year old, please PM them.

The only people even worth posting developments or download releases are;
`Rich
Palidino76
Kihomura
Yz85Racer

I know Yz85Racer doesn’t work on developments/download releases, but it would be nice to see something from him.

Read full topic
